Posts.Content: hi hope I'm on the right page. I was dignosed in oct 15 wiv Breast cancer I have had chemo and now finished, I finished in Aug 2. I'm now waiting for surgery for mastectomy. I have  lymphodema in left hand where I had nodes remove. I'm on hormone tablets now and waiting to have radiotherap. I'm now getting pains in my left breast where the cancer has been diagnose. Can any one explain wat the pains can be.  There is no redness or discharge from the nipple. Worried it might be the cancer back
Posts.Title: Hi hope I'm in the right group. I was diagnosed in October 2015 with...

Posts.Content: Hi Paula  thanku for ur reply I'm going to see breast nurse Thursday hopefully. I also had a lumpectomy and had 6/25 nodes removed of which 6 were infected. My consultant said that it was only small 1mm.  it's a mind game all this worry.  I'm dealing wiv lymphoma, worrying about the op as both consultants don't know wat to do as I'm not a small chested lady!! Then all these different pains "is it cancer or isn't it" driving myself round the bend. Everyone tells me I'm a strong lady but dealing wiv this is just beyond belief and I know I shouldn't be moaning I should b thankful.
Posts.Title: Hi hope I'm in the right group. I was diagnosed in October 2015 with...

Posts.Content: Hi Lyn  i did have cancer removed,  I had a op to do this. The consultant had informed me that I still have pre cancer cells hence the op for mastectom. All this cancer lark is making me ill.  I know i need to relax and I keep getting told "it is as it is" argh
